title: Google’s Gemini chatbot gets upgraded image creation tools
summary: Google’s Gemini chatbot app now lets you modify both AI-generated images and images uploaded from your phone or computer, Google announced in a blog post Wednesday. Native image editing in Gemini will start rolling out gradually today, expanding to more people in over 45 languages and most countries in the coming weeks. The launch follows […]

filter_verdict.reasoning_summary: Significant update to Google's Gemini chatbot with new image editing capabilities, but not groundbreaking enough to be 'Breaking'.

seo_agent_results.generated_article_body_md:
## Google’s Gemini Chatbot Enhances Image Editing Capabilities  

Google announced a major Gemini chatbot upgrade, introducing native image editing for both AI-generated and user-uploaded photos. The feature begins rolling out today and will expand to most countries and over 45 languages in the coming weeks.  

The update allows users to modify images directly within the Gemini app, streamlining creative workflows. Google’s blog post highlights this as a step toward more versatile AI-powered tools.
